Generating recipes using grapa and a gan
========================================

In this tutorial, we try to use grapa code to create a graph generative adversial network. We use this graph GAN to create recipes (We work on drink recipes to make these recipes easier).
This Tutorial is written in google colab, and you can find it here https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1k_rtfaJRCX06kIHzkzQ7Dnr6QR5k45jx?usp=sharing
